content.question: Directions: Suggested planning and writing time - 35 minutes.Write an essay that:Has a relevant thesis.Addresses all parts of the question.Supports thesis with specific evidence.Is well organized.Analyze the influence of humanism on the visual arts in the Italian Renaissance. Use at least THREE specific works to support your analysis.

frqParts.text: Directions: Suggested planning and writing time - 35 minutes.Write an essay that:Has a relevant thesis.Addresses all parts of the question.Supports thesis with specific evidence.Is well organized.Analyze the influence of humanism on the visual arts in the Italian Renaissance. Use at least THREE specific works to support your analysis.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
